data: I am taken out of the pillory and narrowly escape going to the whipping-post.

The Admirable Lady Biddy Fane
Her Surprising Curious Adventures In Strange Parts & Happy Deliverance From Pirates, Battle, Captivity, & Other Terrors; Together With Divers Romantic & Moving Accidents As Set Forth By Benet Pengilly
